items.strItemDescription: Ever turning, ever marching, toward fate's end. (Cosmetic) (CC: Element, Trim)
Ever turning, ever marching, toward fate's end. (Cosmetic) (CC: Trim)
Ever turning, ever marching, toward fate's end. (Cosmetic) (CC: Element, Trim)
A worn cloak, decorated with trophies of past hunts of the shadowed wilds. (Cosmetic)
Despite its age and apparent wear, this cloak is still thick and warm. Perfect for cover from the outdoor elements. (Cosmetic)(CC:Base/Trim)
A clouded orb of unknown origin, its light still lingers. What could sustain such power after so long? (Cosmetic)

This massive set of wings is designed after those of the Giant Circada, said to emerge from underground once every 3000 years to deafen all with their incessant cries. Click to change the wings' position! (Cosmetic)
"Caw" (with rhythm). (Cosmetic)

There are legends of a Guardian who went missing for some time, only to return, changed. Though he did his duties to the letter, he spoke to no one, until one day, he sprouted dark wings and flew away, never to be seen again. (Cosmetic)

Legends tell of a paladin who vanished while exploring some mountainous caves. Many years later, he re-emerged, changed, bearing strange relics of unknown origin. This backback was one of those. Click to change form! (Cosmetic)
In the long lost land of Astravia, the Stargazers were said to be oracles, able to divine the future from patterns in the stars. (Cosmetic)
A revered cloak, once woven in celestial magic, its threads imbued with the grace of their kindred in times long forgotten. (Cosmetic)
These texts shimmer in the haze of battle, yet never burn. Try as you might to read them, you cannot make out any recognizable words. (Cosmetic)
This glimmering cloak is supposedly older than written history, yet it remains as pristine as ever. (Cosmetic)
Worn by those before, and worn by those after, this cloak is said to match its wearer's persona. (Cosmetic)
Once stolen from the Flamegrave Keeper, this eerie dagger channels the essence of necromantic flames. (Cosmetic)
Forged from the remains of ice elementals and imbued with the magic of the elusive frost fairies, this dagger is as beautiful and deadly as the coldest winter night. (Cosmetic)
Forged from the remains of ice elementals and imbued with the magic of the elusive frost fairies, this weapon is as beautiful and deadly as the coldest winter night. (Cosmetic)
Forged in a distant land and style, this distinctive dagger has been pulled through countless adventures and quests to finally land in your hands. (Cosmetic)
This crown has passed through the hands of many great rulers and heroes, each adding their own unique embellishments to its design. (Cosmetic)
This crown has passed through the hands of many great rulers and heroes, each adding their own unique embellishments to its design. (Color Custom to Dragon Horn and Eye)
A menacing helm worn by druidic rangers as they hunt their prey, forged using the teeth of an ancient and lost species of wolf. (Cosmetic)
Wrought from the skull of a mystical deer, the Crest beckons druidic rangers to tread the shadowed paths of the wild and untold. (Cosmetic)
Crafted by a tormented artist as her interpretation of Death's visage, its previous owners have all been driven mad by visions of shadowy figures. Maybe you'll be the exception. (Cosmetic)

Crafted by a tormented artist as her interpretation of Death's visage, its previous owners have all been driven mad by visions of shadowy figures. Maybe you'll be the exception. Now with spikes! (Cosmetic)
A macabre helm created in the image of a nightmarish creature, this cursed relic is said to augment a necromancer's dominion over the undead. (Cosmetic)
The inside of this ice-encrusted helm is surprisingly warm! Was this made for elementals... or from them? (Cosmetic)
This mask serves as a ward against dissonant sounds as you stride through the chaos to your own melody. (Cosmetic)
A helm that once bathed in the sun's brilliance, its wearer was bound by sworn vows to seek and defy encroaching shadows. (Cosmetic)
Once favored by a long-forgotten order of rangers in Greenguard, this hood is a blend of comfort and stealth. (Cosmetic)(CC:Base/Trim/Hair)
An esteemed helm said to have been cast in a Celestial forge. Its crest is infused with ancient elemental magic, reflecting the deeds of a forgotten age. (Cosmetic)
Though at first glance this hood appears to be of gnomish make, the technology behind it is more akin to that of the Magesterium... (Cosmetic)
Those who wear the Ashened Veil are said to be possessed by the burning fires of elementals. Surely that's just a legend, though? (Cosmetic)
Though clearly a relic of Doom, this ferocious helm was forged in an unknown land. Now, it has found its way to you... (Cosmetic)
It's said most Astravian Stargazers went blind looking to the stars in search of prophecy. Perhaps this helm was intended to help slow the inevitable? (Cosmetic)
Error: Helm cannot load, please restart and try again. (Cosmetic)
This darkened crown was found buried in a pile of old weapons and armor during an annual cleaning of the Falconreach Guardian Tower. None could remember its origins. (Cosmetic)
Idol by day, hero by night. Or whenever you want, with the power of time at your command!(Cosmetic)
This stylish helmet is specially forged to protect your head while you barrel through time! Note: Only tested going forward through time. Click to show stylish goggles! (Cosmetic)
Forged from the remains of ice elementals and imbued with the magic of the elusive frost fairies, this mace is as beautiful and deadly as the coldest winter night. (Cosmetic)

While the Magesterium purports to give each Magester equal standing in the eyes of the Shapeless, exemplary Magesters are still awarded with certain trinkets of status, such as this decorative cane. (Cosmetic)
A trusty Paladin's weapon, imbued with Light! (Cosmetic)
A trusty Paladin's weapon, imbued with Light! (Cosmetic)
A trusty Paladin's weapon, imbued with Light! (Cosmetic)
A trusty Paladin's weapon, imbued with Light! (Cosmetic)
Carved from a single bone from a long extinct creature, this blade drips with ancient malice. (Cosmetic)
A wicked scythe that burns bright as it cuts through soul and bone alike. Once thought to have been wielded by Death, some believe it to have been created by a different entity entirely... (Cosmetic)
A mysterious weapon, presumably a relic from another age. Whether that is the past or future is impossible to say. (Cosmetic) (CC: Element, Trim)
This mysterious weapon feels like it both exists and yet does not. Your eyes and mind simply cannot process what it looks like! Using it makes you feel like you're wielding nothing at all. (Cosmetic)
An ancient Azaveyran relic once locked away in the Magesterium's vaults, this blade glows with mysterious power... (Cosmetic) (CC: Element)
A big DragonCoin for you to smack your foes with! Cysero told you that this is just a huge piece of chocolate wrapped in a gold foil, but try as you might, you cannot unwrap it. Curious. (Cosmetic)
This is literally just a single DragonCoin. It was worth one DragonCoin, but as of right now, after inflation, it is priceless. (Cosmetic)
An axe wielded by Ballyhoo. Used to cut prices in half. Sadly, this version is (Cosmetic), so...
Once used in ceremonies and rituals lost to ruins, this antique weapon was secured from the ruins of Hawkscry... and is now available for your personal collection! (Cosmetic)
Once used in ceremonies and rituals lost to ruins, this antique weapon was secured from the ruins of Hawkscry... and is now available for your personal collection! (Cosmetic)
Once used in ceremonies and rituals lost to ruins, this antique weapon was secured from the ruins of Hawkscry... and is now available for your personal collection! (Cosmetic)
In a distant land, carrying this torch is a great honor. In your hands, it's just a fancy weapon. (Cosmetic)
In distant lands, there are tales of a dark-winged demon who would soar through the skies searching for prey... (Cosmetic)
Legend has it that this weapon was forged over the course of years from one million cherry blossoms. How that was possible is, of course, unknown. (Cosmetic)
An ancient tool, once bound to a sacred anvil. Whatever history they may have forged together has been lost to time. Click to change its appearance! (Cosmetic)
Wreathed in embers, the heat along this blade's edge burns with an unnatural hunger. (Cosmetic)
An ancient vampire warrior once stored her victories away in this blade to savor in times of scarcity... And when those times came, the blade was nowhere to be found. (Cosmetic)
This mysterious key was said to unlock the hidden gates to the realm of Fairies... But such gates have yet to reveal themselves. (Cosmetic)(CC: Base, Element)

Back in the days of Hawkscry's peak, a powerful spellsword forged this beautiful weapon by her own hands. Like so much else, it was thought to be lost to ruin... Click to change grip. (Cosmetic)(CC: Base, Trim, Element)
As you wield this you feel the hums and pulses of an unknown resonant energy, as if it hails from another time or place entirely. (Cosmetic)
A deadly fusion of conductor's baton and gunblade, carrying swift symphonies of destruction. (Cosmetic)
A versatile staff from the frozen Northlands, shaped for both magic and blade. It carries the legacy of those who braved the ice and its countless perils.(Cosmetic)
Across history, this sleek blade has only come to life in the hands of specific wielders. How these wielders are chosen is unknown. (Cosmetic)
Once stolen from the Flamegrave Keeper, this eerie staff channels the essence of necromantic flames. (Cosmetic)
Forged in a distant land and style, this distinctive staff has been pulled through countless adventures and quests to finally land in your hands. (Cosmetic)
Forged from the remains of ice elementals and imbued with the magic of the elusive frost fairies, this staff is as beautiful and deadly as the coldest winter night. (Cosmetic)
Forged from the remains of ice elementals and imbued with the magic of the elusive frost fairies, this sword is as beautiful and deadly as the coldest winter night. (Cosmetic)
Forged in a distant land and style, this distinctive sword has been pulled through countless adventures and quests to finally land in your hands. (Cosmetic)
Once stolen from the Flamegrave Keeper, this eerie sword channels the essence of necromantic flames. (Cosmetic)
Forged from the remains of ice elementals and imbued with the magic of the elusive frost fairies, this wand is as beautiful and deadly as the coldest winter night. (Cosmetic)
It's said that a storm of ice elementals once attempted to sweep across the land on wings of frost. (Cosmetic)
Created by Celestials in a time long past, these magnificent wings still radiate power and presence. (Cosmetic)
